caption: Figure 1: Framework of HalluEditBench. For real-world hallucinations, we holistically assess the performance of knowledge editing on Efficacy, Generalization, Portability, Locality, and Robustness.
description: The figure illustrates the framework of HalluEditBench, which holistically evaluates knowledge editing methods by assessing their performance across five dimensions: Efficacy, Generalization, Portability, Locality, and Robustness, using real-world hallucinations.
section: 2 HalluEditBench: HOLISTICALLY BENCHMARKING KNOWLEDGE EDITING METHODS IN CORRECTING REAL-WORLD HALLUCINATIONS

caption: Figure 2: Statistics of HalluEditBench Across Topics and Domains.
description: The figure shows the distribution of hallucinations across different topics and domains for three different LLMs.
section: 2 HalluEditBench: HOLISTICALLY BENCHMARKING KNOWLEDGE EDITING METHODS IN CORRECTING REAL-WORLD HALLUCINATIONS
